metadata.title: CVE-2021-25289 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. TiffDecode has a heap-basedbuffer overflow when decoding crafted YCbCr files because of certaininterpretation conflicts with LibTIFF in RGBA mode. NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-35654.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25289` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.3
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.3').
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
